name: Portable Power Station 300W 257wh Lithium Battery Bailibatt Small Portable Generator for Home Use Camping Travel Emergency Hunting Outdoor, Large Power Bank with AC Outlet for Laptop

To turn on/off the AC output, press and hold the 'AC' button (BailiBatt power station) for three seconds, and for optimal battery maintenance, recharge the unit at least once every 1-2 months when not in use.

name: Anker Portable Power Station SOLIX C300, 288Wh LiFePO4 Battery, 300W (600W Surge) Solar Generator, 140W Two-Way Fast Charging, for Outdoor Camping, Traveling, and Emergencies (Solar Panel Optional)
short_description: Compact with Massive Power: It's portable power that moves as freely as you. Give your devices 300W (600W Surge) and 288Wh. Fast charge with 140W two-way USB-C ports.
8 Device Charging Ports: Power all your tech with versatile ports, including 3× AC (300W), 1× car socket (120W), 2× USB-C (140W), 1× USB-C (15W), and 1× USB-A (12W).
Travel-Friendly Design: Attach the strap(sold separately) or simply carry this power station. It's 15% smaller than similar designs and perfect for spontaneous adventures.

Solar-Powered Escapes: When your journey needs endless charging, do so seamlessly and sustainably with a 100W solar panel. We recommend 100W or 60W Anker Solar Panel. This power station is not compatible with Anker SOLIX PS30 (or other 5V~3A USB-C panels), PS200, PS400.
Your Choice of Recharging: Recharge to 80% in just 50 minutes with a wall outlet, or use solar panels, your car, or the PD 3.1 USB-C port. Stay charged, no matter where you are.
10 Years of Power: Built to last a decade, power up with LiFePO4 batteries, designed to last 3,000 cycles. Also enjoy smart temperature control, impact resistance, and a 5-year warranty.
Quiet 25dB Power: Rest while you power in nature. This power station only emits 25dB from 3.3 ft away.
What is in the Box: Anker SOLIX C300 Portable Power Station, AC Charging Cable, Safety Manual, and Warranty Info

name: Takki Portable Power Station 111Wh, Camping Solar Generator Lithium Battery Pack with 110V AC DC USB Ports LED Flashlight for Home Use Camping Laptop CPAP Emergency Power Backup
short_description: With a battery capacity of 111Wh (30000mAh/3.7V), the portable power station is compact(‎5.7 x 4.13 x 3 inches) and lightweight(2.3 lbs), has 8 output ports, including 1*2 pole and 1*3 pole 110V AC output socket (80W running, 120W peak), 2*QC 3.0 18W USB ports, 2*USB ports (5V 2.4A), 1*12V DC and 1*18W Type-C. It supports power for devices up to 80W/Peak 120W.(Solar panels not included)

The power station can power the USB devices up to 80W, such as cell phones, iPads, tablet, Cameras, Drones, LED lights, etc. Camping solar generator can also as emergency power to charge for portable TV, laptop, projecter, radio, mini car refrigerator, small fan and CPAP within 80W.(Solar panels not included)

This portable power station is built with a 3-level brightness LED flashlight and 2-level brightness light panel, press the flashlight switch to change the brightness and SOS mode. 111Wh portable power station with two methods to charge the solar generator that can be charged via AC adapters or in direct sunlight via 15-25 volt solar panels(Not Included). Camping power station is ideal emergency battery backup kits for home power outage, beach essentials and survival kit etc.

You will get 1*111Wh portable power station, 1*AC adapter, 1*cigarette lighter, 1*user manual. The solar generator with MPPT controller and cooling fan prevents overheating and overcharging of the power station, thus providing battery protection.

name: Portable Power Station 300W (Peak 600W), GRECELL 230.88Wh Solar Generator with 60W USB-C PD Output, 110V Pure Sine Wave AC Outlet Backup Lithium Battery for Outdoors Camping Travel Home Blackout
short_description: 【230.88Wh Capacity, 330W Output】330W (600W surge) pure sine wave supports most laptops, tablets, phones, lights, fans, CPAP medical devices, projectors, TV, mini-refrigerator, speaker, camera (rated power less than 330W). 230.88Wh huge capacity but light weight makes it compact and perfect for camping, car trips and other family outings.

【Upgraded Battery Management System】We promise to adopt quality lithium batteries since we found that the use of lower-quality batteries could pose a serious risk to life and should become a crucial part of deciding what to buy. Upgraded BMS provides built-in overload, overcharge (automatically stops charging when the device is full), and short-circuit protection. Dual built-in silent cooling fans help to keep the station's temperature safe.

【USB-C PD 60W, USB-A QC 18W】PD60W fast charging makes it possible to charge Android and iPhone, tablets, and laptops quickly, more than twice as fast as other standard USB-C output, and ultra-high efficiency in emergencies. All USB-A ports are quick-charge 3.0 18W, providing higher efficiency for each device.

【Ultra-Fast Charging & 6-Port Versatility】 Charge 6 devices at once: 1x AC outlet, 1x USB-C PD 60W (2X faster for laptops/phones), 1x USB-C PD 18W, 2x USB-A QC 15W, and 1x car port. The 40W solar panel with built-in MPPT maximizes sun energy, while AC/car charging offers 3 flexible power sources.

【3 Ways To Recharge, Built-in MPPT Controller】GRECELL power station, can be charged via an AC outlet, a solar panel, or a car outlet. Built-in MPPT (Maximum Power Point Tracking Control) so it can extract the maximum power from the solar panel, optimizing the utilization of variable power sources like a solar generator.

name: MARBERO 88.8Wh Portable Power Station Backup Lithium Battery Solar Generator 150W Max AC & 30W USB-C Output for Camping Hiking RV Off-Grid Living CPAP Home Outage Emergency (Solar Panel Optional)
short_description: COMPACT AND PORTABLE LIKE DSLR: This portable charging station measures just 6.12 x 3.69 x 4.19 inches and weighs only 2.27 lbs—about the size of a DSLR. This portable generator fits easily into a backpack or suitcase for effortless mobility. Designed with an ergonomic handle and durable plastic casing,and an LED flashlight with 3 adjustable brightness levels, offering 37 to 68 hours of runtime and an SOS mode for emergencies. Ideal for camping, hiking, road trips, home backup,etc.

88.8Wh CAPACITY: This camping power bank is equipped with a 24,000mAh / 88.8Wh lithium-ion battery, delivering reliable energy on the go. Compact yet powerful, it provides extended runtime for essential devices—perfect for powering a drone, camping light, GoPro, portable fan, or even a 12V tire inflator and mini car fridge for short periods. Whether you're capturing moments outdoors or ensuring power during a outage, this portable solution is ideal for outdoor adventures, home emergency backup, and more.

FAST CHARGING WITH MULTIPLE OUTPUTS: Equipped with 2 x 100W AC outlets (150W max), 2 x QC3.0 USB-A ports (18W), and 2 x PD3.0 USB-C ports (18W & 30W), this portable power bank delivers fast, efficient charging for a variety of devices and small appliances. Ideal for powering gear at construction sites, mobile workshops, photography sets, or during outdoor vendor events.

3 RECHARGING WAYS: There are 3 ways to recharge the solar generator. It takes 3 hours to charge from 0% to 80% using an AC wall outlet; it can also be recharged under direct sunlight with a solar panel (DC 13V-25V/1.7A Max) (not included); or you can recharge it with a car lighter adapter.

SECURED & RELIABLE PROTECTION: Powered by a smart Battery Management System (BMS), this portable power supply features a battery lifecycle of over 500 charges and built-in safeguards against over/under-voltage, over-current, overload, over-temperature, and short-circuit. Rear cooling vents help regulate heat, while automatic shut-off ensures safe operation—giving you total peace of mind indoors or outdoors.

WHAT YOU GET: 1 x MARBERO Portable Power Station M138, 1 x Power Adapter, 1 x Car Charger Adapter, and 1 x User Manual. Backed by a 12-month supports and 24/7 customer service, MARBERO ensures reliable support long after your purchase.

name: Jackery Explorer 1000 v2 Portable Power Station,1070Wh LiFePO4 Battery,1500W AC/100W USB-C Output, 1 Hr Fast Charge, Solar Generator for Camping,Emergency, RV, Off-Grid Living(Solar Panel Optional)
short_description: Powerful yet Compact: Boasting a 1,500W AC output and a 3,000W surge peak, the Solar Generator 1000 V2 can power multiple appliances, including AC units, fridges, and electric pots. With a 1,070Wh capacity and a lightweight build of only 23.8 lbs, along with a foldable handle, it makes an excellent companion for outdoor camping, road trips, or emergencies.

One Hour Fast Charging: Charge your Explorer 1000 v2 Portable Power Station from 0% to 100% battery level in just one hour with emergency charging activated via the Jackery App. It defaults to 1.7 hours for a full charge to optimize battery health. Engineered with advanced ChargeShield 2.0 technology, this power station charges safer, faster, and smarter.

10 Year Lifespan: The Explorer 1000 v2 portable power station is equipped with a durable LFP battery, maintaining over 70% of its original capacity even after 4,000 charge cycles, offering longevity exceeding 10 years.

Tailored for Versatility: Featuring two USB-C ports, one USB-A port, one DC car port, and three pure sine wave AC ports, along with LED lights, the Solar Generator 1000 V2 is capable of charging multiple devices simultaneously, meeting power needs in various scenarios. PD 100W fast USB-C charging ensures a rapid charging speed, even without power adapters.

Smart App Control: Effortlessly switch between different charging modes with Jackery’s App—including one hour emergency charging from 0 to 100%, 30 dB quiet overnight charging mode, and energy efficiency mode. Maximize the freedom to adjust the power station to meet your needs.

What You Get: 1 * Explorer 1000 v2, 1 * User Manual, 1 * AC Charging Cable. (𝐍𝐨𝐭𝐞: To enjoy the 1-hour super charging, please enable the emergency charging function in the Jackery App before charging each time. The E1000v2 defaults to a 1.7-hour charging mode to optimize battery health.)

𝐈𝐦𝐩𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐚𝐧𝐭: 𝐏𝐥𝐞𝐚𝐬𝐞 𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐯𝐢𝐝𝐞 𝐚𝐧 𝐚𝐜𝐭𝐮𝐚𝐥 𝐚𝐝𝐝𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐬 𝐟𝐨𝐫 𝐚𝐧𝐲 𝐨𝐟 𝐲𝐨𝐮𝐫 𝐨𝐫𝐝𝐞𝐫𝐬. 𝐔𝐧𝐟𝐨𝐫𝐭𝐮𝐧𝐚𝐭𝐞𝐥𝐲, 𝐩𝐫𝐨𝐝𝐮𝐜𝐭𝐬 𝐜𝐚𝐧𝐧𝐨𝐭 𝐛𝐞 𝐝𝐞𝐥𝐢𝐯𝐞𝐫𝐞𝐝 𝐭𝐨 𝐣𝐮𝐬𝐭 𝐚 𝐏𝐎 𝐁𝐨𝐱 𝐚𝐝𝐝𝐫𝐞𝐬𝐬. The Explorer 1000 V2 is compatible only with Jackery solar panels for solar charging.

The car DC charger output cable(included) will supply power to car fridge, vacuum cleaner, and air compressor. name: Camping Portable Power Station 198.4Wh, [4-Port Fast Charging] LiFePO4 Battery Power Bank Small Electric Generator with Detachable Light, 100W USB-C Output for Home Backup Outdoor Emergency
short_description: 【198.4Wh Mega Capacity & 4 Device Charging Ports】This 198.4Wh (62,000mAh) portable power station ‌charges a phone‌ 15 times, ‌a laptop‌ 5 times, ‌a tablet‌ 7 times, a camera 14 times, etc. Its 4 ports (2x 100W USB-C PD, 2x 18W USB-A QC) power 4 devices simultaneously ‌and are compatible‌ with most electronic devices. Perfect for camping, remote work, or emergencies - no more battery anxiety!
【Industry-Leading Triple Core Technologies】①𝐌𝐢𝐥𝐢𝐭𝐚𝐫𝐲-𝐆𝐫𝐚𝐝𝐞 𝐁𝐌𝐒 + ②𝐀𝐈 𝐓𝐞𝐦𝐩𝐞𝐫𝐚𝐭𝐮𝐫𝐞-𝐂𝐨𝐧𝐭𝐫𝐨𝐥 𝐂𝐡𝐢𝐩 + ③𝐔𝐩𝐠𝐫𝐚𝐝𝐞𝐝 𝐋𝐢𝐅𝐞𝐏𝐎₄ 𝐁𝐚𝐭𝐭𝐞𝐫𝐲 = Highest-Level Safety and Durability.

【Military-Grade BMS – Industry's Strictest Safety Standards】With SiC components and redundant design, this BMS works well in extreme conditions (14°F to 140°F), offering 3X shockproof performance and 2X the safety/durability of industry-standard BMS. Compliance with MIL-STD-810G military BMS standards ensures complete mitigation of thermal runaway risks.

【AI Temperature-Control Chip – 10% Reduction in Thermal Loss】This portable power station features an AI temperature-control chip that reduces thermal loss by 10%. It achieves ‌98% energy efficiency in lab tests‌ and ‌95% in real-world use‌, outperforming traditional power stations (90% max).

【Upgraded LiFePO₄ Battery – Lasts Over 10 Years】ATGIH's upgraded LiFePO₄ battery features nano-Al₂O₃ anode coating, limiting electrode expansion to <2% (8-12% for traditional process) and boosting cycle life to ‌4,000+ cycles‌ – ‌33% longer‌ than standard LiFePO₄ batteries with 3,000+ cycles.

【Compact & Portable Power On The Go!】This power station is designed for ultimate mobility. The ergonomic carry handle‌ lets you take reliable power anywhere—whether hiking, camping, or traveling. Its space-saving design fits effortlessly into backpacks and car trunks.

【80W Fast Charging Input】Use the included PD 100W USB-C to USB-C cable to charge this portable power bank to 80% in 2h and 100% in 2.5h. Plus, the HD LED display enables real-time monitoring of remaining capacity and per-port charge status. Note: Fast charging requires a ≥60W charger; lower wattage reduces charging speed. (Charger not included)

【Detachable Camping Light with 4 Adjustable Modes】This portable power supply comes with a detachable camping light featuring four modes (Low/High/Spotlight/SOS). It works as a standalone flashlight and supports two charging options: contact-based charging on the top of the power station or USB-C wired charging.

【What is in the Box?】ATGlH Portable Power Station with Camping Light, 9V/12V USB-C to DC Cable*2 (Powers DC-port devices: routers, modems, drones, and more.), USB-C to C Cable, Instruction Manual. Our specialists are always online for you.
